snippet.title: Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator: Glorious Princess - Trailer
snippet.description:
Dice and the Tower of the Reanimator: Glorious Princess is a RPG with dice-rolling element.
You must use your dice and wits to break through the many obstacles in a tower and find an elixir to save the Glorious Princess.

The game will be available on Steam in the summer of 2021.
For further information, you can wishlist it to keep track of follow-up news
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1489290/_/
or follow MaouCat Studio's FB fan page.
https://www.facebook.com/MaouCatStudio
